backend/main.mo: Core Motoko canister defining user profiles, products, orders, commissions, referral bonuses, wallets, payouts, and access-controlled queries/mutations with in-memory maps and ID counters.
backend/migration.mo: Migration script converting old userProfiles to the new format by adding the referredByAssociateId field.
backend/migration/Validation.mo: Simple validation helper providing empty‑text check.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components for onboarding and referral updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: High‑level descriptions of all major frontend files, their purposes, and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables defining light/dark color systems and global UI tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the root element and loading the main client script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with authentication gating, profile‑setup modal logic, and route definitions for all pages.
frontend/src/components/common/QueryStat: Reusable loading, error, and empty‑state UI components.
frontend/src/components/formatters/money: Utility functions for formatting INR currency and bigint timestamps into readable strings.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Page layout wrapper with navigation, containerized content, and authenticated footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNav.ts: Navigation bar component showing user, admin, and mobile nav links with logout handling based on identity and admin status.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal for creating a user profile with validation, referral handling, and mutations to save or register the profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing login, logout, stored identities, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, referrals, admin checks, and related backend mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables with green-focused design tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDeniedPage.tsx: Simple page showing an access denied message with a button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCatalogPag: Admin page for managing products, including listing, creating, editing, and marking ID-eligible products with dialog-based form handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPayoutsPag: Admin interface to review, approve, or reject payout requests with status filtering and user profile lookup.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogItemPage.tsx: Displays a product’s details, allows quantity input, and submits an order after authentication.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Lists all products and services, grouped by category, with navigation to individual item pages.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows user profile metrics including referrals, earnings, and orders, with a referral link copy feature.
frontend/src/pages/EarningsPage.tsx: Provides detailed earnings, commissions, and bonus history with filtering and summary cards.
frontend/src/pages/NetworkPage.tsx: Displays the user’s downline structure with member details and counts for each referral level.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Simple 404 page with a message and button to return home.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailPage.tsx: Displays details of a single order, including product info, totals, and status, after validating identity and fetching order and product data.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Shows a table of the user's order history with product names, status, totals, and navigation to individual order pages.
frontend/src/pages/PayoutsPage.tsx: Provides a dashboard for viewing earnings, submitting payout requests, and listing payout request history with validation and status handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Loads and displays the user's profile data with an edit mode for updating personal and associate information.
frontend/src/pages/ReferralsPage.tsx: Displays referral code and link sharing tools and lists direct referrals with their basic profile data.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Renders a branded sign‑in screen that triggers Internet Identity login and redirects authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/utils/referrals.ts: Helper functions to build referral links, read referral codes from URLs, and copy text to the clipboard.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing parameter cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the application's project state, requirements, architecture notes, and known issues.
